HOME.HERO_SUBTITLE: Social Pediatrics and Child Development Specialist
HOME.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Combining modern medicine with traditional values, we are here for your child's healthy growth.

ABOUT.PAGE_SUBTITLE: Integrating child health with social pediatrics and child development
ABOUT.TITLE: Dr. Özlem Mürzoğlu
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Pediatrics and Child Health Specialist
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: With over 15 years of experience, I apply the most current treatment methods for your children's health. We provide services according to American Academy of Pediatrics standards.
ABOUT.MISSION_DESC: To provide care in a loving environment with the most current medical knowledge for the healthy growth and development of your children.
ABOUT.VISION_DESC: To be a leading clinic in child health with globally accepted methods according to American Academy of Pediatrics standards.
ABOUT.VALUES_DESC: We operate with principles of scientific approach, transparency, empathy, and continuous improvement.

SERVICES.SUBTITLE: Comprehensive services for your child's health

SERVICE_LAB.TITLE: Laboratory and Imaging
SERVICE_LAB.DESC: Comprehensive diagnostic services with Biruni Laboratories and Sonomed Imaging partnership

SERVICE_LAB.INTRO: We use the most advanced diagnostic methods for your child's health, providing reliable results for accurate diagnosis and treatment.

SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.TITLE: Triple P® Program
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.DESC: Positive Parenting Program - Licensed by University of Queensland
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.HERO_SUBTITLE: Licensed Triple P® Practitioner from University of Queensland
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.INTRO: Strengthen your relationship with your child, reduce behavioral problems, and increase family harmony.

SERVICE_SLEEP.TITLE: Healthy Sleep™
SERVICE_SLEEP.INTRO: We provide support with scientific methods to help your baby and child develop healthy sleep habits.

SERVICE_BRIGHT_FUTURES.TITLE: Bright Futures®
SERVICE_BRIGHT_FUTURES.DESC: American Academy of Pediatrics Well-Child Care

SERVICE_BRIGHT_FUTURES.INTRO: We monitor your child's physical, mental, and social development at the highest level from birth to adolescence.

SERVICES.FEATURED_SERVICES_DESC: We provide services with globally accepted programs according to American Academy of Pediatrics standards

SERVICES.PROCESS_SUBTITLE: Steps we follow to provide you the best service
SERVICES.PROCESS_STEP1_DESC: Book online or by phone. Fill out age-appropriate forms.
SERVICES.PROCESS_STEP2_DESC: Detailed examination and evaluation lasting minimum 1 hour.
SERVICES.PROCESS_STEP3_DESC: Creating a treatment and follow-up plan specific to your child.
SERVICES.BENEFIT1_DESC: Comprehensive care with social pediatrics doctorate and child development expertise
SERVICES.BENEFIT2_DESC: Current treatment protocols according to American Academy of Pediatrics standards
SERVICES.BENEFIT3_DESC: Child-friendly clinic design and warm, reassuring atmosphere
SERVICES.BENEFIT4_DESC: Minimum 1 hour for each examination, detailed evaluation without rush

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Reviews from Our Families
TESTIMONIALS.SUBTITLE: We experience the joy of serving hundreds of families with 15 years of experience
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_1: Dr. Özlem is truly a very special doctor who knows how to approach children. With the care and patience she shows at every check-up of my son, and the detailed information she provides, I feel much safer. I researched a lot when choosing a pediatrician, I definitely made the right choice.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_2: The cleanliness of the clinic and modern equipment caught my attention. Thanks to Dr. Özlem's social pediatric approach, my daughter's fear of doctors has completely disappeared. It's also very easy to make an appointment, and her assistants are very caring and helpful.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_3: My child had recurring infections. Thanks to Dr. Özlem's accurate diagnosis and patient treatment, he is much healthier now. Both her knowledge and her approach to children are excellent. As a family, we are very satisfied.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_4: We go for my son's growth and development follow-up. Dr. Özlem does a very detailed examination each time and patiently answers all our questions. The atmosphere of the clinic is also very comfortable and peaceful for children.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_5: When we applied for my twin babies, Dr. Özlem was very supportive. She solved our feeding problems and helped us establish their sleep routines. She is truly an experienced doctor who loves children. I would recommend her to everyone.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_6: We go regularly for my child's vaccination follow-up. Dr. Özlem provides very detailed information about vaccines and never rushes. Our waiting time at the clinic is never long. The appointment system works very organized.

CLINIC.GALLERY_SUBTITLE: Our spaces designed for our little patients to feel safe and happy in our modern, hygienic and child-friendly environment
CLINIC.FEATURE_CHILD_FRIENDLY_DESC: Colorful and fun spaces where children will feel comfortable
CLINIC.FEATURE_HYGIENE_DESC: Sterile and safe examination environment with the highest hygiene standards
CLINIC.FEATURE_ACCESS_DESC: Arrangement suitable for stroller and wheelchair access

DOCTOR_BIO.TITLE: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu
DOCTOR_BIO.SUBTITLE: Pediatrics and Child Health Specialist
DOCTOR_BIO.BIO_PARAGRAPH_1: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu graduated from Istanbul University Istanbul Medical Faculty and completed her pediatrics specialization training at Marmara University Faculty of Medicine, Department of Pediatrics and Child Health.
DOCTOR_BIO.BIO_PARAGRAPH_2: Having obtained her doctorate degree in Social Pediatrics from the same institution, Dr. Murzoğlu also completed her undergraduate education in Child Development, developing a holistic approach to child health.
DOCTOR_BIO.BIO_PARAGRAPH_3: Specialized in Bright Futures® Well-Child Care, sleep counseling and Triple P® Positive Parenting Program, Dr. Murzoğlu provides comprehensive pediatric services to families at her clinic in Ataşehir.
DOCTOR_BIO.SPECIALIZATION_SCHOOL: Marmara University Pediatrics and Child Health

LEGAL.PRIVACY_INTRO_TEXT: At Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatric Clinic, the privacy of our patients' and website visitors' personal data is extremely important to us. This privacy policy is prepared to inform you about how your personal data is collected, used, and protected.
LEGAL.PERSONAL_INFO_1: Name, surname, and date of birth
LEGAL.DATA_PROTECTION_TEXT: We take the following measures to ensure the security of your personal data:
LEGAL.DATA_SHARING_TEXT: Your personal data will not be shared with third parties except in the following cases:
LEGAL.SHARING_CASE_4: Requests from Ministry of Health and related institutions
LEGAL.YOUR_RIGHTS_TEXT: Under the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698, you have the following rights:
LEGAL.RIGHT_1: Learning whether your personal data is processed
LEGAL.RIGHT_2: Requesting information about your personal data
LEGAL.RIGHT_3: Learning the purpose of processing and whether it is used appropriately
LEGAL.RIGHT_5: Requesting deletion or destruction of data
LEGAL.RIGHT_6: Objecting to adverse results arising from analysis of data processed exclusively through automated systems
LEGAL.COOKIES_TEXT: We use cookies on our website to improve user experience. You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings.
LEGAL.CHILDREN_PRIVACY_TEXT: Personal data of individuals under 18 years of age is processed with the consent of their legal representatives (parent/guardian). Maximum care is taken to protect the privacy of your children.
LEGAL.CHANGES_TEXT: This privacy policy may be updated when necessary. Updates will be published on our website and the last update date will be indicated.
LEGAL.CONTACT_TEXT: For questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us:
LEGAL.TERMS_INTRO_TEXT: These terms of service govern your use of Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatric Clinic website and our services. By using our site, you are deemed to have accepted these terms.
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_1: The website is for informational purposes and does not replace medical advice
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_2: In emergencies, call 112 or visit the nearest healthcare facility
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_3: Appointment booking does not mean final acceptance, confirmation is required
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_4: Our services are only provided at our clinic address
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_5: Online consultation services are subject to predetermined conditions
LEGAL.BOOKING_RULE_1: Appointments must be made at least 24 hours in advance
LEGAL.BOOKING_RULE_2: Maximum one appointment can be booked on the same day
LEGAL.BOOKING_RULE_3: Appointment confirmation is done via SMS or phone
LEGAL.CANCELLATION_POLICY_1: Appointment cancellations must be made at least 4 hours in advance
LEGAL.CANCELLATION_POLICY_2: New appointment restrictions may apply for patients who miss 2 consecutive appointments
LEGAL.CANCELLATION_POLICY_3: No cancellation period required for emergencies
LEGAL.PAYMENT_TERM_2: Cash, credit card, and health insurance payments are accepted
LEGAL.PAYMENT_TERM_3: Prices may change without prior notice
LEGAL.PAYMENT_TERM_4: Additional fees may be charged for procedures not covered by insurance
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITIES_TEXT: When using our website, you must comply with the following rules:
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITY_3: Not engaging in behavior that compromises site security
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITY_4: Respecting copyright and intellectual property rights
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITY_5: Not sharing misleading or false information
LEGAL.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_TEXT: All content, design, logos, and graphics on our website belong to Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatric Clinic. Unauthorized use, copying, or distribution is prohibited.
LEGAL.MEDICAL_DISCLAIMER_TEXT: Information on our website is for general informational purposes and does not replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a healthcare professional for your health concerns.
LEGAL.LIABILITY_TEXT: We cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages that may arise from the use of the website. No guarantee is given regarding the accuracy, currency, and completeness of site content.
LEGAL.GOVERNING_LAW_TEXT: These terms of service are subject to the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Istanbul Courts and Enforcement Offices have jurisdiction in case of disputes.
LEGAL.TERMS_CHANGES_TEXT: These terms of service may be changed without prior notice. Changes take effect on the date they are published on the website.
LEGAL.KVKK_INTRO_TEXT: This disclosure text has been prepared to inform you about the processing of your personal data as Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatric Clinic in our capacity as data controller, pursuant to Article 10 of the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698.
LEGAL.KVKK_IDENTITY_DATA_TEXT: Name, surname, Turkish ID number, date of birth, place of birth, marital status, gender
LEGAL.KVKK_HEALTH_DATA_TEXT: Medical history, examination findings, test results, treatment information, prescriptions, vaccination records
LEGAL.KVKK_TRANSACTION_DATA_TEXT: IP address, visited pages, browser information
LEGAL.KVKK_PURPOSE_1: Provision and monitoring of healthcare services
LEGAL.KVKK_LEGAL_BASIS_TEXT: Your personal data is processed based on the following legal grounds specified in Articles 5 and 6 of KVKK:
LEGAL.KVKK_LEGAL_BASIS_3: Inability to obtain consent due to actual impossibility
LEGAL.KVKK_LEGAL_BASIS_4: Necessary for the establishment or performance of a contract
LEGAL.KVKK_TRANSFER_TEXT: Your collected personal data may be transferred to the following parties, limited to the purposes stated above:
LEGAL.KVKK_TRANSFER_1: Ministry of Health and affiliated organizations
LEGAL.KVKK_RETENTION_TEXT: Your personal data is retained for the periods specified in relevant legislation (minimum 20 years for medical records) or until the processing purpose ceases. Upon expiration of the period or cessation of the processing purpose, your data will be deleted, destroyed, or anonymized.
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the following rights pursuant to Article 11 of KVKK:
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_1: Learning whether your personal data is processed
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_3: Learning the purpose of processing and whether it is used appropriately
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_4: Knowing third parties to whom data is transferred domestically or abroad
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_5: Requesting correction if processed incompletely or incorrectly
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_6: Requesting deletion or destruction within the framework of conditions specified in Article 7 of KVKK
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_7: Requesting notification of correction or deletion operations to third parties
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_8: Objecting to adverse results arising from analysis exclusively through automated systems
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_9: Requesting compensation for damages due to unlawful processing
LEGAL.KVKK_APPLICATION_TEXT: Pursuant to Article 13 of KVKK, you can submit your request to exercise your above rights in writing or via registered electronic mail (KEP) address, signed with a secure electronic signature, or using your email address previously notified to our clinic at info@drozlemmurzoglu.com.
LEGAL.KVKK_APPLICATION_INFO: Your application will be evaluated and concluded within 30 days at the latest. The application is free of charge, but fees may be charged if the transaction requires additional costs.
LEGAL.KVKK_CONTACT_TEXT: For detailed information about your rights under KVKK and application processes, you can contact us:
